Please review the enclosed documentation for accuracy and contact me with any
questions. In the event that I am not available and you need to speak to someone
immediately, please contact the area manager at (248) 975-5053.

III. DESCRIPTION OF FINDINGS
The facility is in compliance with all applicable rules and statutes.
1.) Any violation listed in section 1 is also an ISEP violation. Please note that there are
additional ISEP requirements that may not be included in section 1. The facility is in
compliance will all additional ISEP requirements except for the following: In
compliance.
2.) Any violation listed in section 1 is also a DHHS Contract/Policy violation. Please note
that there are additional DHS Contract/Policy requirements that may not be included
in section 1. The facility is in compliance will all additional DHHS Contract/Policy
requirements except for the following: In compliance.
IV. TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE
The facility was offered technical assistance in the following areas: None at this time.
V. CONSULTATION
The facility was offered consultation in the following areas:
 Request Sumpter House to notify Department of Child Welfare Licensing when
a mother – child client is placed at the facility.
VI. EVALUATION OF RENEWAL PERIOD
There were no substantiated incidents of maltreatment in care during this licensing
period.
Sumpter House did not have any corrective action plans during this inspection period.

VII. RECOMMENDATION
Based on inspection findings the facility is in compliance with all applicable licensing
statutes and rules and/or ISEP requirements and/or contract and policy. It is
recommended that the facility continue on their regular license.
